title: Yo Yo Ma Plays Ennio Morricone
description:
Yo-Yo Ma Plays Ennio Morricone is a 2004 album of recordings from Morricone's various film scores by cellist Ma. The album was recorded with the Roma Sinfonietta Orchestra and Gilda ButtÃƒÂ  on piano. It was released as a standard compact disc on September 28, 2004 (093456), and a DualDisc using Dolby Digital 5.1 Surround Sound on February 8, 2005 (093472).
